outcome: Instability grows as factions vie for control over the BCI system.

events.description: A secretive meeting of high-ranking Council members occurs, discussing who should take over control of the BCI.
Rumors leak of competing factions within the system, causing concern among citizens and small-scale protests.
Key advisors in the Directorate split into alliances, drafting competing plans for BCI's future management.
An internal power struggle among factions results in data loss, impacting thousands of BCI scores.
